invoices.correctionReason: Zmiana adresu, ilości godzin, stawki VAT
Zmiana adresu, ilości godzin, stawki VAT

get.description: Gets a list of invoices created in the system for your company.

parameters.name: documentsPerPage
parameters.description: Defines the amount of invoices polled per page

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Defines the page we want to poll

parameters.name: searchPhrase
parameters.description: Freetext search over concatenated fields InvoiceNumber, ContractorName, ContractorTIN and ContractorCity

get.description:
Retrieve data for a particular invoice available in the system

This endpoint may be used as a base for new invoice data that we wish to create based on a set of related invoices

If you wish to generate such object base you will need to provide both:
* `related` parameter, listing the related invoices
* `invoiceType` of the new invoice we wish to create

The return object will be a temporary invoice object you may further extend before saving it.

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: InvoiceId identificator of the exact invoice we wish to retrieve

parameters.name: related
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of related invoices we wish to create a reference from

parameters.name: invoiceType
parameters.description: Invoice type for the new invoice we wish to create based on related invoices

200.description: Returns a pre-signed URL with requested data file

data.description: Pre-signed URL that allows us to download the file requested

parameters.name: exportFileType
parameters.description: Defines the output file type of export; JPK_FA is only available for SALES
Defines the dataset for our export
parameters.name: exportType

get.description:
This endpoint allows you to download any set of invoices (either sales or expenses) from your company

Additional filters (with same parameters as for listing invoices) may be applied to reduce the amount of documents requested.

post.description: Sets the payment status of selected invoices as paid, marks paidAmount as whole amount.
Sets the payment status of selected invoices as unpaid, sets paidAmount to 0.

data.description: Pre-signed url to download invoice PDF copy

post.description:
Requests a PDF copy of selected invoice
A pre-signed URL, valid for up to 10 minutes will be generated that allows the user to download the file

parameters.name: documentsPerPage
parameters.description: Defines the amount of invoices polled per page

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Defines the page we want to poll

parameters.name: searchPhrase
parameters.description: Freetext search over concatenated fields InvoiceNumber, ContractorName, ContractorTIN and ContractorCity

get.description: Gets a list of expense invoices imported into the system for your company.

post.description:
Creates a reference for the new expense to be imported into the system
Returns a pre-signed url that allows you to send the expense file directly to the system's storage.

In order to finish the job you need to use the pre-signed link from response (`data.uploadURL`) in another PUT command, attaching the file in question.

Note: The response now returns `invoiceId` instead of `fileId` to align with the expense creation workflow.

mime.description: Mime type of the file we wish to upload

md5.description: MD5 checksum of the file we wish to upload

override.description: Override if a duplicate was found?

private.description: Whether the file should be marked as private

post.description: This endpoint provides the means for adding/updating contractor data for later use in the system

contractorId.description: Identifier used if we wish to update an already existing contractor

country.description: Two letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alfa-2

post.description: This endpoint provides the means for adding/updating sale invoice Categories for later use in the system
This endpoint provides the means for adding/updating sale invoice products for later use in the system

This endpoint allows you to send an issued invoice to your contractor over email.
In order use the endpoint, proper configuration of global reply-to email is required (Settings > Sales > E-mail messages)

requestBody.description:
Either `recipient` array or `recipientFromSystem` is required in order to send the e-mail.
If not provided `topic` and/or `content` will be loaded dynamically from the company email configuration.

`content` accepts both raw text as well as HTML data that will be parsed and cleaned up before being added to the email content.

Example 1.errorMessage: This tag cannot be deleted, it has been used in at least one invoice. You can disable it so it won't appear on the suggestion lists.
Example 1.errorMessagePL: Ta kategoria nie może zostać usunięta ponieważ została użyta w przynajmniej jednej fakturze. Możesz ją zablokować aby nie pojawiała się na liście sugerowanych.

examples.errorMessage: This tag cannot be deleted, it has been used in at least one invoice. You can disable it so it won't appear on the suggestion lists.
examples.errorMessagePL: Ta kategoria nie może zostać usunięta ponieważ została użyta w przynajmniej jednej fakturze. Możesz ją zablokować aby nie pojawiała się na liście sugerowanych.

ErrorResponse.description:
Default error message format in Altera API
Depending on particular reason, different HTTP Status codes will be employed

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Invoice model for objects returned from server

override.description: Defines whether we wish to override split payments warning, in Machine-machine integrations should be set to `true`

invoiceId.description: Invoice identificator, used for updating documents

invoiceType.description: The type of invoice we wish to create

invoiceFormat.description: Defines the Invoice numbering format that will be used; Altera providesa set of pre-defined formats right after company creation. They can be reviewed in the UI

isReceipt.description: Defines whether we are creating an invoice to an already issued receipt

relatedInvoicesIds.description: Optional array of invoiceIds that should be related to the document we are creating; Rule of thumb if you wish to work with relatedInvoices (CORRECTION, INTERIM_FINAL) it is best to start from th pre-populated object retrieved via GET /sales/invoice with parameter `related` in use

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alfa-2 two letter country code

email.description: Comma delimited list of contractor e-mails

productPosition.description: Zero based position number in invoice

unitNetPrice.description: Defines the net price per item

unitGrossPrice.description: Defines the gross price per item

vat.description: Defines the vat rate used for this product

additionalDetails.description: Describes extra information that we wish to present on the invoice

correctionReason.description: Additional information regarding the reason behing correcting your invoice

bankAccountNumber.description: Defines the bank account no. we wish to receive funds to

SuccessResponse.title: SuccessResponse
SuccessResponse.description:
Regular format of success response in Altera API
Retrieved information will always be stored in the 'data' node

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description: OpenApi Key created within Altera.app for a certain company
